ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Re: Welcome to shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Baneluk. Sorry to say this list is pretty much dead. An email about once every six months, and if we re lucky it isn t spam. :) Enjoy the Shadowknight. I
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Baneluk. Sorry to say this list is pretty much dead. An email
about once every six months, and if we're lucky it isn't spam. :)

Enjoy the Shadowknight. I haven't played in two years, but the
Shadowknight's were always one of the most fun RP classes out there,
imo.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Michael Schaefer [mailto:mbs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 18, 2003 10:38 AM
> To: shadowknight@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Welcome to shadowknight
>
> Hi
>
> I am playing a Troll Shadowknight on Mithanial Marr server, new to the
> game, my first character. So far so good...
>
> :)
>
> Baneluk
>
>
>
>
> shadowknight Moderator wrote:
>
> >Welcome to the Shadow Knights Mailing List!
> >
